verses.roman:
caitanya-gosāñira ei tattva-nirūpaṇa
svayaṁ-bhagavān kṛṣṇa vrajendra-nandana

synonyms: caitanya-gosāñira—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ei—this; tattva—of the truth; nirūpaṇa—settling; svayam-bhagavān—Himself the Supreme Personality of Godhead; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; vrajendra-nandana—the son of the King of Vraja.
translation: The conclusion is that Lord Caitanya is the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa, the son of the King of Vraja.
